column3: School of Natural and Computing Sciences
column5: This programme equips you with the essential Computational Thinking (CT) and data analysis skills needed to extract knowledge and insights from data.There has been a huge increase in demand for data and computational specialists across almost every industry, from energy and manufacturing to retail, healthcare and cyber security. As the volume, diversity and complexity of data available continue to increase, the key challenge facing organisations today is unlocking their data to inform business decisions.
